game.moviedex: [{:Title=>"The House by the Cemetery", :Year=>"1981", :Director=>"Lucio Fulci", :imdbRating=>"6.2", :Plot=>"A New England home is terrorized by a series of murders, unbeknownst to the guests that a gruesome secret is hiding in the basement.", :Poster=>"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDBlNzhkNWEtNjgzNC00ZjA5LTkwYzctMDIzMjAwZDA5ZTU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_SX300.jpg", :Genre=>"Horror", :hp=>-0.7999999999999998}, {:Title=>"Dead Rising: Endgame", :Year=>"2016", :Director=>"Pat Williams", :imdbRating=>"4.7", :Plot=>"In a zombie-infested quarantined zone of East Mission City, investigative reporter Chase Carter must stop a secret government conspiracy.", :Poster=>"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NzY2MzgxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzIxNjE1OTE@._V1_SX300.jpg", :Genre=>"Action, Horror", :hp=>-1.2999999999999998}, {:Title=>"Zombie Nightmare", :Year=>"1987", :Director=>"Jack Bravman, John Fasano", :imdbRating=>"2.6", :Plot=>"A mother resorts to voodoo to get back at those who killed her son.", :Poster=>"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM4ZDc1NWQtMjc3MS00YTYyLTg2MzgtNDY1ZDI1NmZjYzI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE5MjUyOTM@._V1_SX300.jpg", :Genre=>"Fantasy, Horror", :hp=>-0.3999999999999999}, {:Title=>"Uncle Sam", :Year=>"1996", :Director=>"William Lustig", :imdbRating=>"4.5", :Plot=>"Desert Storm vet who was killed in combat rises from the grave on July Fourth, to kill the unpatriotic citizens of his hometown, after some teens burn an American flag over his burial site.", :Poster=>"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGYzMzZhZmItNWE1Ny00ZDA5LWI5NTYtMTkyMGVjNWJjOTg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_SX300.jpg", :Genre=>"Comedy, Horror", :hp=>-3.5}, {:Title=>"Manhattan Baby", :Year=>"1982", :Director=>"Lucio Fulci", :imdbRating=>"4.9", :Plot=>"An archaeologist opens an Egyptian tomb and accidentally releases an evil spirit. His young daughter becomes possessed by the freed entity and, upon arrival back in New York, the gory murders begin.", :Poster=>"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzU3N2JhNGItMTVlYy00MmJiLWJjMWItYTRmMzI1OWRlODAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQ2MjQyNDc@._V1_SX300.jpg", :Genre=>"Horror", :hp=>-0.09999999999999964}]
